repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04

MAINTAINER melpon <shigemasa7watanabe+docker@gmail.com>

RUN locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 && \
    update-locale LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
      make \
      wget && \
    apt-get clean && \
    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
